title: Supersymmetric quantization of Yang-Mills theory and possible applications
abstract: We develop a new operator quantization scheme for gauge theories where no gauge fixing for gauge fields is needed. The scheme allows one to avoid the Gribov problem and construct a manifestly Lorentz invariant path integral that can be used in the non-perturbative domain. We discuss briefly an application of the method to Abelian projections of QCD.
